scripts.install-services: for /d %s in (*-*) do (cd %s && npm install && cd ..)
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd api-gateway && npm run dev" "cd auth-service && npm run dev" "cd user-service && npm run dev" "cd course-service && npm run dev" "cd grade-service && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd api-gateway && npm start" "cd auth-service && npm start" "cd user-service && npm start" "cd course-service && npm start" "cd grade-service && npm start"
